summary: WHILE HAVING OUR CAR SERVICED UNDER CLOCKSPRING RECALL, THEY FOUND THE SERPINTINE BELT TENSIONER FROZEN AND WATER PUMP LEAKING COOLANT. THE DEALER GAVE US AN ESTIMATE OF $566 TO REPLACE THE SERPENTINE BELT, TENSIONER, WATER PUMP, AND COOLANT FLUSH. THE DEALER TOLD US THE BELT COULD FAIL AT ANY MOMENT.
